Sunful womman ich habbe ibeo &punctelev; &slong;o nelle ich neuere eft mo&rrot;e

&YOGH;if me grace heom fo&rrot;to bete &punctelev; þo&rrot;u&yogh; holie churche lo&rrot;e

here ich fo&rrot;&slong;ake mi &slong;unful lijf &punctelev; and alle mine luþere dede
In claene&slong;&slong;e and in penaunce ichulle &punctelev; mi lijf hereafturward lede
Þo heo hadde to þulke &ydot;mage &punctelev; longue icrid and ibede

Withoute lettingue In heo &yogh;eode &punctelev; welle þat heo wa&slong; þo bliþe and glad
heo &yogh;eode In bifo&rrot;e þe rode &punctelev; and þo heo hire mi&yogh;te iseo
